summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of Twenty-third Avenue South, from Hanford Street to Spokane Street; of Horton Street from Twenty-third Avenue South, as widened herein, to a point 356 feet east of the east margin of Twenty-fourth Avenue South; of Hinds Street, from Twenty-third Avenue South, as widened herein, to Twenty-fourth Avenue South, as provided in Ordinance No. 42957 of said City, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
